examplecode.javacode
Class ExceptionTemplate

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Throwable
        |
        +--java.lang.Exception
              |
              +--examplecode.javacode.ExceptionTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ExceptionTemplate
extends java.lang.Exception

A class representing the archetypical exception class from which one can copy to build new exceptions.

Version:
1.2 $Date: 2005-01-24 11:51:21 +0000 (Mon, 24 Jan 2005) $
Author:
Joseph R. Kiniry, Daniel M. Zimmerman
